sense.def:
Pride
je občutek zadovoljstva, ki ga človek ima, ker je on sam ali nekdo, ki mu veliko pomeni, naredil ali ima nekaj dobrega.

seg.quote: His mother looked at him with affection and pride.
She pointed with pride to the fine horses she had trained.

sense.def:
Pride
je občutek ponosa in spoštovanja sebe.

seg.quote: My pride did not allow me to complain too often.
Pride alone prevented her from giving up.

sense.def:
Pride
je tudi človekov občutek, da je boljši ali vreden več kot drugi.

To pride oneself on a quality or skill
pomeni biti zelo ponosen, da imamo neko lastnost ali spretnost.

seg.quote: Mrs Hochstadt prided herself on her intelligence.

sense.def:
To take pride in something
pomeni biti zadovoljen in srečen zaradi nečesa, kar imamo ali delamo.

seg.quote: I take great pride in the success of my children.

sense.def:
To swallow one's pride
pomeni odločiti se, da moramo narediti nekaj, česar raje ne bi naredili ali česar se sramujemo.

seg.quote: He swallowed his pride and accepted the money.

sense.def:
Kadar ima nekaj v skupini
pride of place
, je najpomembnejše v skupini.

seg.quote: Musical compositions take pride of place in the festivities.
